sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="file" ref="romfile" @change="readBytes" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'FileDrop',
  props: {
  },
  methods: {
    readBytes() {
        const file = this.$refs.romfile.file;
        console.log("file:",file)
        const reader = new FileReader();
        reader.addEventListener("loadend", function() {
            if (reader.result) {
                this.$emit.load("data",new Uint8Array(reader.result));
            }
        });
	reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>


</style>
